name: Mark Davis
text: Heavy-set African-American employee has an atrocious attitude. I hope he’s just having a bad day, but I won’t be back if he is behind the counter! …More

name: Steve Powell
text:
Great Chicken Cobb Salad to Go.
The dressing was very good. The staff was very friendly and courteous.  The selections were very good. The price was right for airport food.  You can find this place inside security.

name: Dave Kester
text: Would of liked to eat here but the guy making the sandwiches was wearing his mask on his chin, breathing all over the food and no hair net either.

name: Arin Sarris
text: A frequent flyer / visitor to BDL, I only stumbled onto this place recently. Grabbed a breakfast omelet wrap which was quick / easy / delicious. We were there early so the place was not crowded either. A nice alternative to some of the …More

name: Sherry Decelles
text: 9/21/2019: I had one the the breakfast "sandwiches" which is served in a whole wheat wrap. All I could taste is layers of pasty wrap. I had to peel most of it off to taste the filling. Two sips of the coffee and I had to toss it. It must of …More

name: Raj Ramjit
text: Huge disappointment.  Sign shows a lovely lobster on toasted bread.  What do you actually get,  lobster on a hot dog bun, toasted on the outside. that cost me $19.  Should have gone to one of the other nice restaurants with beer, great seats and table.  The attendant was nice though but food still sucks.  What a rip off!

name: J A
text: Standing here watching the only woman on this shift working while the other three guys are standing around and chatting while there’s a line of people waiting for food. One of the guys actually pulled out his cellphone and just kept …More

name: Jay Hayden
text: Good hot and cold sandwiches, including lobster !!

name: Farmano
text: If you are at Bradley Airport and starving, I suggest that you are better off starving than eating here. The stuff (I won’t call it food) is atrocious. I had a salad with rotten greens and rubber, gristle, chicken. I am not a picky eater, but this was just horrible. Oh, did I say it was expensively boot.

name: Jack Stagna
text: Made to order grilled sandwiches is the claim to fame here. However the quality of meats is subpar, and often during busy flight/meal times you should expect a significant wait to receive your order. Limited options in the terminal however often drive passengers to this spot.

name: Theresa Ditrapani
text: I’m a first time customer. I was at the airport location and the workers were very rude and swearing. The guy ringing me up was yelling at the workers. I hope he is not the manager of them because they deserve better then how he was treating them. Zero stars for this location. Management needs to show them how to treat people.

name: Sonia and Rajiv F
text: Cold chicken buffalo wrap with too much sauce could not get my self to eat it.

name: Alan-Mark Iva
text:
Been here only once, so won't rate higher without more experience. First impression was good though... food is tasty, service courteous and timely.
#Would_eat_here_again

name: Spenser Villwock
text: Incredibly exceptional rude service and uninspiring menu.  Keep walking.

name: Tricia Zawacki
text: Systems were down cash only no problem. How they handled it? A big problem. They couldn't take the time to figure out the tax so they rounded prices up. I did the math and the lady argued that she wasn't shorting her system. Seriously? First time I tried to eat here at Bradley and certainly my last

name: Tony Reccek
text:
I've eaten here twice. Once for breakfast and once late for dinner
I won't eat here again.
Poor ingredients,  dry, stale etc. Lackluster service.
No wonder the line is shortest in the airport.

name: Dave T.
text: Learned today that there is a such a thing as a bad Philly cheesesteak sandwich

name: Missy Rey
text: It took 15 minutes to get my burger while the 6 people who ordered after me all got their food. And when I went back to ask for an item that was missing from my sandwich, they put the sandwich I had handled and taken a bite out of an inch …More

name: Barbara Valentine
text: love love your tuna.   o.  m   g so scrumptious... thanks

name: Ken Heil
text: Easy place to get a quick bite before your flight.enjoy

name: Sean Albro
text: The sandwiches at D'Angelo are amazing. The meat is nice and tender, and the bread tastes fresh is fluffy af

name: Sue Ruggiero
text: the food is great but the employee who served me at the Bradley airport today is rude and needs to be reminded why she is there.   resteraunts need return customers . and this one won't be back.

name: Julie Creedon
text: Out of simple option like Italian grinder meats. Staff making sandwiches were inappropriately talking about personal relationships loudly! Uncomfortable to place order. Probably won't eat here again!

name: Keith Teller
text:
Stood at the counter with 3 others and watched 1 employee make sandwiches and three others standing around just talking to each other
April 1,2019 at approximately 6:15 pm

name: A Kelis
text: Breakfast sandwich was not good and it took forever for it to come out. Also had a piece of some sort of mop string in my bread..very akward

name: David Vallina
text: Quick to take your order, but so SLOW to deliver. Cooks spend more time talking and flirting than working.

name: Bill Bresee
text: staff working morning shift are an asset to the company.. very courteous and polite..

name: Rhonda Cooper
text: Great customer service  food was good

name: Chris Bludworth
text: Very good steak egg and cheese breakfast sandwich

name: Miles Buckingham
text: Closed despite stating on hours that it was open.

name: Srijit Bhattacharya
text: Ordered a chicken sub here. Was tasteless and bad. Not a place to get good food.

name: Ralph Price
text: Slow production

name: billy babcock
text: It sucked

name: Carl Foote
text: Slow service

name: Hayden Allen
text: Good food but terrible service. Out of multiple items I tried to order.
